title: Organised games in the junior school
creator_credit: Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Attico Films
brief_description: The film deals with the structure of the games lesson for third and fourth year junior children. The main features of children’s play are discussed and from these evolve the basic requirements of the schools games program. Emphasis is given to the preparation, special organisation and deployment of apparatus.
